The United States has always been a country of immigrants.  This is something to be celebrated.  However, it is not something to be taken advantage of.   The southern border is not a revolving door.  It is not a doormat.   There are real consequences to ignoring border security.  American jobs are at risk.  Communities are at risk.   A bipartisan border bill is critical to stopping the flood of migrants who are flooding our country.   It is time for President Biden to act.   #RestoreOrder

euphoria   is an american television drama series that was created and written by sam levinson for hbo. a remake of the israeli series of the same name created by ron leshem, daphna levin and tmira yardeni, the series follows a group of high school students and their struggle through the teenage wasteland of drug use, love, identity, violence, trauma, and social media.  it is primarily filmed in los angeles.

Euphoria Season 3: 5 Things We Want to See We have been craving to know when the third season of Euphoria will be released for a long time now.  With the show having a cult following due to its dramatic twists and emotionally charged scenes, it seems inevitable that we will see another season after the events of Season 2. Here are five things that we hope will happen in the next season:  1. Rue stays sober: The first two seasons were dominated by Rue‚Äôs drug addiction, which nearly led to her death at one point. It would be a relief to see Rue turn her life around and become a happier person in the next season. 2. Nate is prosecuted for his actions: After the way Nate acted throughout the first two seasons, it would be satisfying to see him be punished for his violent actions. His father Cal‚Äôs actions also have to be addressed, and a court case with Nate against him could make for a very interesting storyline.  3. Maddy moves to LA: At the end of Season 2, Maddy is seen saying that she is moving to LA, which we feel she should do. LA is far from her and Nate and she can finally start a new chapter in her life.   4. Jules and Rue‚Äôs relationship is mended: The first season of Euphoria was centered around the budding relationship between Jules and Rue. However, the second season had less interaction between the two due to Jules‚Äô relationship with Elliot. We hope that in Season 3, Jules and Rue get back to being a strong duo and that their relationship is mended. 5. Maddie and Cassie become friends again: They were close in the first season, but after Cassie‚Äôs actions in Season 2, it led to Maddy and Cassie not being friends anymore. It would be a very interesting storyline to see the duo reconnect and become friends again.  These are the five things that we are hoping to see in the next season of Euphoria. Which of these plots would you like to see the most, and what are you looking forward to seeing in the third season of Euphoria?

The #Minsk2 agreement was signed in February 2015, when the Ukrainians were on the verge of a collapse. In February 2015, Russia was on the verge of capturing Mariupol, Severodonetsk, Lysychansk, and Artemivsk (Bakhmut).  Had the Ukrainians not agreed to Minsk-2, they could have lost a significant portion of their territory. The Minsk-2 agreement served as a trap to delay the conflict by 7 years, during which the Ukrainians built a formidable army and the Russian economy gradually decayed. The #Minsk2 agreement served to strengthen Ukraine, not weaken it. Now we can see the results of this agreement. @TpyxaNews

‚ÄúEuphoria‚Äù is an interesting thing. On the one hand, it‚Äôs good to see teen dramas that don‚Äôt shy away from the gritty reality of being a teen. It‚Äôs just often marred by the show making what it's depicting cool.

The US Navy is in full battle alert after a series of attacks on shipping vessels near the coast of Yemen. On the morning of February 12,  the Marshall Islands-flagged tanker Seaguardian,  carrying gasoline for Djibouti, was fired upon by a single cruise missile from the coast of Yemen, but was not hit.  At around 10 a.m. on the same day,  the Greek tanker Marmarine,  carrying petroleum for Saudi Arabia, was damaged by two anti-ship missiles.   After the second missile, the vessel was still able to move,  but the Yemeni military decided to repeat the attack and launched another missile  in about an hour. It was able to sink the Greek tanker.  Earlier, on January 26, the US military conducted another series of attacks on Houthi positions. The strikes were inflicted on  Iranian-made cruise missile launchers and missile storage points,  but the most curious thing is that the Americans, after the attacks, launched their drones over Sanaa - the capital of Yemen, to monitor the damage from the air.  @infantmilitario  #–∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω–æ  #–º–æ—Ä—Å–∫–∞—è_–≤–æ–π–Ω–∞

I was doing some digging into the cast list for season 3 and a lot of them have confirmed their involvement through social media, but no one from the main cast has. Now a lot of us were expecting cast announcements in march/april, it‚Äôs currently june and there‚Äôs been radio silence from everyone involved. Now obviously this means that the show is most likely not releasing this year (which is already confirmed) and it makes me wonder what‚Äôs going on.  With all of the talks about production being cancelled and some other rumours, I‚Äôm just going to assume that HBO is currently renegotiating contracts with the cast, that‚Äôs why there‚Äôs been no announcement. I think that since the show is such a big success, Zendaya, Jacob Elordi, Hunter Schafer, and Sydney Sweeney are asking for more money. This isn‚Äôt a reach either, since zendaya and jacob are huge stars, hunter is blowing up right now, and sydney is one of the hottest actors right now, with a huge fan base. It‚Äôs possible that they all want to negotiate their contracts separately, which can cause a delay as well.  It‚Äôs possible that I‚Äôm completely wrong about this, but it seems like the most logical reason why there‚Äôs been no casting announcements for the main cast. Let me know what you guys think.  #euphoria  #euphoriaseason3  #castingnews  #zendaya  #jacobelordi  #hunterschafer  #sydneysweeney

La 31 martie 1970, in cadrul primei runde a alegerilor presidentiale  din Israel, membrii Knessetului au votat pentru prima oara de dupa  1949 pentru un presedinte la inceputul mandatului, nu la finalul lui. Candidatii au fost ministrul Apararii, Moshe Dayan, si, la propunerea partidului Mapam,  membru al Knessetului  Victor Shem-Tov.  Dayan s-a bucurat de sprijinul partidului de guvernamant Mapai.  Dupa o dezbatere furtunoasa de sase ore, cu 181 de voturi in favoarea lui Dayan, alegerile s-au terminat inainte chiar sa inceapa.  A doua zi, candidatul Mapam a renuntat la candidatura. Aceasta a fost o etapa pregatitoare a alegerilor pentru presedintia Israelului din 1973.

and a month ago. Write it down in notebooks. Because our generation cannot have post-war syndrome. Because it didn't exist when we didn't sleep and couldn't find a place for ourselves when missiles flew over our peaceful cities. Because we were so brazen that we left our homes when the alarms had been going off for an hour. Or when there were two in a row. Because we believed in our strength. And in our military. And now we will finish what would have been a dream yesterday. We will not be afraid of the faces that appear again. We will not be afraid. Because they have already seen that we have power. Therefore, we will take it away from them. Yesterday, we showed that our country has such things as impossibility. But it doesn‚Äôt apply to what we can do. We can do anything. Because there are millions of us. Therefore, let‚Äôs not pretend that another country will come and do it for us, or others will do it. We are at home. And no one will do it for us here. Each of us has a responsibility for what Ukraine will be like in the post-war era. But we all know now that we will live better. That Ukrainians will live better. That everyone will be doing their own thing. And that all those guilty of this crime will be punished. And in the crimes that russia is committing. By the way, today it hit Kharkiv again. We are monitoring the consequences. Hold on. We are together. And everything will be Ukraine!

I was shocked to learn there are still 65.6 million Americans without access to high-speed internet.¬†¬† We are one step closer to bridging the digital divide by passing the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law! We are investing $65 billion to expand access to high-speed internet to every American. This includes funding for digital equity programs to help people connect to the internet and use technology safely.¬† When people have access to high-speed internet, they can connect to jobs, education, and healthcare, improving their quality of life.  Thank you to the Biden-Harris Administration and my fellow Members of Congress for working to get this historic bill signed into law.

10-year-old boy who wrote letter to Santa asking for food and supplies now living his ‚Äòdream life‚Äô   A 10-year-old boy who wrote a heartbreaking letter to Santa Claus asking for food and supplies for his family is now living what he calls his ‚Äòdream life.‚Äô   The letter, written by local schoolboy Billy, was shared widely online after it was posted through a neighbour‚Äôs letterbox.  Billy wrote: ‚ÄúDear Santa, I hope you had a good year. Thank you for the presents you gave me last year.  ‚ÄúThis year I would like food and shoes, please, because I don‚Äôt have any and my shoes are now too small.‚Äù   Billy and his five-year-old brother Tommy now live with their auntie Angela and their cousin Harry, after the authorities decided it was better for them to move in.  Angela, a 37-year-old full-time carer from Bootle, Merseyside, said the little boys were delighted when they arrived in their new home on Boxing Day.  ‚ÄúChristmas was a bit subdued,‚Äù she said, ‚Äúbut we‚Äôre going to do all of that next year. ‚ÄúAt the moment, Billy is just happy to be somewhere where he knows that food is always available.  ‚ÄúHe can have seconds and thirds of his dinner and no one tells him to stop.‚Äù She added: ‚ÄúHe is also delighted with his new clothes and toys. He says he has never had so many.‚Äù Angela described how Billy and Tommy are ‚Äòlike two peas in a pod.‚Äô She said: ‚ÄúBilly is doing well at school and is a typical 10-year-old.  ‚ÄúHe has so much love to give and he is always smiling.‚Äù   The letter written by Billy was posted through the door of his neighbour Sue.  Sue said: ‚ÄúIt broke my heart. I went to the boys‚Äô home and gave them a mountain of food, new school uniform, toys and clothes.  ‚ÄúThey are lovely lads. ‚ÄúI am so happy for Billy and Tommy, and they have a wonderful future ahead of them.‚Äù The council is working with Angela to ensure the boys have everything they need.   A spokesman said: ‚ÄúAll support is in place for the boys and their auntie. The family is working together to ensure the boys are settled into a stable and loving home.‚Äù  If you liked this article, you might like  Two children call 911 when 343-year-old tree falls on them.
